name: Dr. Lâm Phong
bio: Dr. Lâm Phong has over 7 years of experience in small animal medicine. She specializes in preventive care, internal medicine, and geriatric care for cats and dogs. He is passionate about building long-term relationships with pets and their families.
education: Board Certified in Small Animal Internal Medicine

name: Dr. Minh Tài
bio: Dr. Minh tài is a board-certified veterinary surgeon with expertise in orthopedic and soft tissue surgeries. He has performed over 2000 surgical procedures and is known for his meticulous approach and compassionate care.

name: Dr. Hùng
bio: Dr. Hùng specializes in the care of exotic pets including birds, reptiles, and small mammals. He has extensive experience with unique species and is dedicated to providing specialized care for these special companions.
